column1: Hey, I don't think I've seen you around here before.
Oh that's weak, man. You know what you need? You need a good, stiff drink.
Trust me, man! It'll make you feel better.
Oh, you just need something a little stronger.
If a killer put a knife to my throat, and said, "Have sex with your father or else I'm gonna kill your mother while having sex with you," ...I would have sex with myself.
